name: Good Bye Cruel World
description:
Some error occured due to whice the Game became Unconventional

A/D=Move

heart=Damage

Bomb=Heal

low health=More heart i.e Damage

more health=decrease Score and also more Bomb i.e heal

You lose when Health =0

BALANCE YOUR HEALTH TO GET HIGH SCORE

It was my First Game : How Did I do ..Comment
